patterns: Do lecturers give handouts
responses: Yes they do

patterns: How do I get reading materials?
responses: Text books are made available for purchase in the schools bookshop.

patterns: Does the school supply textbooks
responses: Yes, the books are supplied in the schools book shop

patterns: Are the students victimised for buying handouts
responses: No, Students are not victimised

patterns: What is software engineering all about?
responses: Software engineering is the application of engineering principles to Software applications.

patterns: As a software engineer what is your scope of work/job?
How many students share a room in the premium accomodation?
responses: Premium is 6 people per room, 3 bunk beds in  a room

patterns: How many students share a room in the classic accomodation?
responses: Classic is 4 people per room, single beds with personal reading desks

Breakfast/lunch
Breakfast/supper
lunch/supper 

 Then 3 meals option plan

patterns: What time does caf open in the morning?
responses: Caf is opened from 6:30am-10am for breakfast

patterns: Why do students go to church on Saturdays?
responses: Babcock University is an Adventist school therefore it lies in Adventist faith that Sabbath is on Saturday.

patterns: Is going to church compulsory in Babcock University?
responses: Yes, it is compulsory to attend church services on campus.

patterns: What is a demerit point?
responses: Points deducted for bad behaviour or violation of school rules

patterns: How can demerit points be cleared?
responses: Demerit points can be cleared by visiting the hall admin in your hall of stay to find out what can be given to you as punishment.

patterns: Can students choose who their roommates gets to be
responses: Yes, in some cases students are given the option of picking who their roommate gets to be.

patterns: How much is the school fees per session?
responses: The school fees differs based on your choice of program. Visit the school website for further information.

patterns: Can the school fees be paid in instalments?
responses: Yes, there is a breakdown of how installment payment can be done. Visit the school website to check it out.

patterns: What are the methods of which fees can be paid?
responses: Fees can be paid through bank transfer or directly to your etranzact account which you can find on your student page

patterns: How do we register for our courses?
responses: Courses can be registered on your student page on the school website.

patterns: How can I access course materials?
responses: Soft copies of textbooks or of lecture slides are usually given out by lecturers or you can visit the bookstore for materials

patterns: How can I check my result?
responses: You can check your results on your student page.

patterns: What extracurricular activities are available on campus?
responses: Some of the activites can be Drama groups, Choir groups, Educational groups, Soccer, Basketball, Track races, Volleyball and many others

patterns: What professional exams does the school expose students to?
responses: There are some professional exams organized by some of departments in school, such as that of the accounting department organizing for students to write ATS and ICAN exams

patterns: How does the school prepare its students for these exams?
responses: Tutorials are held and study materials are made available to the students who choose to write the exams

patterns: Does the school orgnaize tutorials for students?
responses: Yes, departments organize tutorials on some basis for its students

patterns: What is etranzact?
responses: A holding account for students to pay their fees to before they transfer it to the university account

patterns: Can I leave school at will?
responses: no, a permit is required to leave the school grounds

patterns: Is there a given dress code?
responses: There is no strict dress code, but students must be compliant as stated in the school handbook

patterns: Are students allowed to take gap years?
responses: Yes, students can take gap years and finish their program later

patterns: How many semesters constitute an academic session in Babcock university?
responses: 2 semesters make an academic year, but in some cases for those with carryovers there is an optional 3rd semester known as summer semester

patterns: Is Babcock university for Christians only?
responses: No, Babcock is open to people of different religions

patterns: What appliances are allowed in Babcock?
responses: Iron, kettle, and fridge

patterns: Is cooking allowed in the halls of residence?
responses: No, no form of cookingis permitted in halls of residence

patterns: Are students allowed to come with vehicles?
responses: Yes, they are allowed to

patterns: How can I access course materials?
responses: Soft copies are available through physical book stores

patterns: What kind of induction process do you have when you join Babcock?
responses: New students undergo matriculation

patterns: If a semester ends without a student registering, what is the solution?
responses: The student will have to do a result upload for that semester

patterns: Why is my page blocked?
responses: Your page can be blocked for different reasons, visit your department for further clarification

patterns: How do I replace my lost student ID card?
responses: You can visit the ID card office

patterns: How many units can a student take in a semester?
responses: It depends on your deparment course load for the semester

patterns: How many units can a student take in a summer semester?
responses: Only 10 credit units are allowed

patterns: Where do students worship?
responses: various worship centres are provided on campus for students to worship in

patterns: Are male students allowed to carry locks?
responses: No, that is against the school rule

patterns: What is the CGPA bracket for a first class?
What is the CGPA bracket for a second class upper?
What is the CGPA bracket for a second class lower?
responses: 3.49 ad below

patterns: Does Babcock graduate students with a third class?
responses: No, Babcock does not graduate third class.
